answers.answer: those are symptoms of diabetes.  the main symptoms are always thristy and drinking, always urinating, always hungry and eating but still losing weight, and fatigue.  it was a good idea to get tested.  fasting blood sugar of over 120 is indictative of diabetes just so you know

question: For the past 6 months,i dont feel myself, i sleep 8 hours but still feel tired,Im hungry all the time, yet im put off food at the same time, i feel sick,like im going to vomit, i struggle to breathe,like have to take deep breathes. I am thirsty 24-7, i drink about 4 litres of water a day,I pass urine alot.I just constanly feel like i am lacking something, just soooo run down. I eat healthy, despite craving junk food all the time. I also get thrush alot and mouth sores. Im just sick of feeling like this. Someone told me it sounds like diabetes, so i went and got tested. im currently waiting for my test results but thought i would ask if anyone happens to know what else these symptoms could be due to. and please dont say stress,i have a great partner,awesome job, that isno stress at all, good income,nice car.. so i know its not stress.Does anyone have any ideas??
title: No idea whats wrong with me
